span.span: Provides a generic interface to a sequence of records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供了面向记录的流的抽象接口。The interface provides an abstract interface to a record-oriented stream. 实例可用于读取和写入日志记录。A instance can be used to read and write log records. 接口提供以下功能：The interface provides the following capabilities, - 使用 方法追加日志记录。Append log records using the methods. - 使用 方法读取追加的记录。Read the appended records using the method. - 使用 方法写入特殊的重新开始记录。Write a special restart record using the method. - 使用 方法从最近写入的重新开始记录中读取重新开始记录。Read restart records from the most recently written restart record using the method. - 使用 方法将记录刷新到持久存储区。Flush the records to durable store using the method. - 为要追加的记录保留空间。Reserve space for appending records. - 通过前调日志基数来释放日志空间。Free log space by advancing the base of the log. - 接收 事件通知，移动日志的基数以释放空间。Receive event notifications to move the base of the log to free space. 日志记录被追加到 实例，每条日志记录都分配有一个唯一的序号。Log records are appended to a instance, and each log record is given a unique sequence number. 在给定的记录序列中，序号是严格递增的。Sequence numbers are strictly monotonically increasing within a given record sequence. 日志记录由不透明数据组成，它们以字节数组段的 的形式提供给 实例。A log record consists of opaque data, supplied to the instance in an of ArraySegments of bytes. 接口还公开一些基本属性，这些属性提供有关日志边界的信息。The interface also exposes a few basic properties which provides information about log boundaries. - 属性包含记录序列中第一条有效记录的序列号。The property contains the sequence number of the first valid record in the record sequence. - 属性包含一个序列号，并且保证它大于最后追加的记录的序列号。The property contains a sequence number that is guaranteed to be larger than the sequence number of the last appended record. - 属性包含最后写入的重新开始区域的序列号。The property contains the sequence number of the last written restart area. - 属性包含可以追加到序列或从序列中读取的最大记录的大小。The property contains the size of the largest record that can be appended to, or read from the sequence. - 属性包含在此记录序列中做出的所有保留的总大小。The property contains the total size of all reservations made in this record sequence. - 如果将 属性设置为 `true`，且 操作因为序列中没有空间而失败，则记录序列将尝试释放空间，然后重试追加操作。If the property is set to `true`, and an operation fails because there is no space in the sequence, the record sequence will attempt to free space, and retry the Append operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新开始区域用于临时存储包含客户端最后一次检查点操作的信息。A restart area is used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation. 需要恢复时，可以分析重新开始区域，以检索最后一次检查点操作中的所有数据。When a recovery is necessary, you can parse the restart area to retrieve all the data from the last checkpoint operation. 这些数据将初始化事务表、脏页表和打开文件表，以便它们能够用于恢复过程。This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process. 可以使用 方法来读取重新开始区域。A restart area can be read using the method. 写入重新开始区域时，字节数组段中的数据将连接成单个字节数组，以便以记录形式追加。When a restart area is written, the data in the byte array segments are concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 在读取重新开始区域时，无法将数据重新拆分为数组段。No provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the restart area is read. 如果指定了保留，写入的重新开始区域将使用集合中包含的保留来占用先前已保留的空间。If a reservation is specified, the written restart area will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation contained in the collection. 如果该方法成功，它将占用能容纳数据的最小保留，而该保留将从集合中移除。If the method succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation that can contain the data, and that reservation will be removed from the collection. 此方法成功完成时，基序列号已更新。When this method successfully completes, the base sequence number has been updated. 其序列号小于新的基序列号的所有日志记录都不可访问。All log records with sequence numbers less than the new base sequence number are inaccessible. 如果记录序列已经释放，或者如果传递了无效自变量，此操作内将立即引发异常。If a record sequence has been disposed of, or if you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately within this operation. 异步追加请求过程中发生的错误（例如，I/O 请求过程中的磁盘故障）将导致在调用 方法时引发异常。Errors that occurred during an asynchronous append request, for example, a disk failure during the I/O request, will result in exceptions being thrown when the method is called.
